mapper.select: select id , agent_id , timestamp , action , order_type , price , coin , base , fee , amount , exchange_order_id , description from order_history where agent_id = #{agentId} order by id asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_history (agent_id, timestamp, action, order_type, price, coin, base, fee, amount, exchange_order_id, description) VALUES (#{agentId}, #{timestamp}, #{action}, #{orderType}, #{price}, #{coin}, #{base}, #{fee}, #{amount}, #{exchangeOrderId}, #{description} )
